body:
How is this different from CreateLocalFilename?  (I mean, I can tell from reading the code, but not really from reading the header.)

Maybe what you actually want to do is add an optional suffix param to CreateLocalFilename?  Or even just call CreateLocalFilename inside of hlo_graph_dumper and just append the suffix to the returned filename?

body_text:
How is this different from CreateLocalFilename?  (I mean, I can tell from reading the code, but not really from reading the header.)
Maybe what you actually want to do is add an optional suffix param to CreateLocalFilename?  Or even just call CreateLocalFilename inside of hlo_graph_dumper and just append the suffix to the returned filename?
